Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Melt a few tablespoons of butter in a skillet over medium heat. Stir in onion and garlic, and cook slowly until the onion caramelizes to a dark brown, about 15 minutes.
Meanwhile melt the remaining butter in a saucepan over medium-high heat along with the tomato sauce, heavy cream, salt, cayenne pepper, and garam masala. Bring to a simmer, then reduce heat to medium-low; cover, and simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Then stir in caramelized onions.

SavedRecipesActivity Username Password Login Register View Recipe Clear Search Find A Recipe Select A Category Select Type: Enter the ingredients that you have Account Info: Username: Change Password: Enter Old Password: Enter New Password: Reenter New Password: Confirm New Password Help \@string/HelpLink Help - Login / Registration Login In order to access your recipes you must first log-in to your account. Enter your username in the first field aptly title \"Username\". Afterwards enter your password into the second field titled \"Password\". Once you have entered the correct credentials you will gain access to your user pages where you can view/create/edit recipes, and change your password. Registration In order to be able to login to your account you must first register for an account. Click on the green button labeled Registration. It will take you to a window with three text boxes and a button. In the first textbox title \"Username\", enter your desired username. This will be used to uniquely identify users. In the second field titled \"Password\", enter your desired password. In the third field titled \"Re-type Password\" enter the same password you typed eariler. This step is to ensure you properly typed your password. Once you are happy with your credentials click the green \"Submit\" button. If everything goes correctly you will be able to login with the credentials you just saved. > Recipe Name Enter the steps to prepare the recipe...
